page.title: 18TRANSPORT
page.content: A Pe_School Group meets at the school from Mondays to Thursdays.During the elections part of the school is used as a Polling_Station.The present Member of Parliament is a Conservative Viscount Cranbourne.The member of the County Council,Mrs.Franklin,is also a member of the Conservative Party. The holiday trade also means an improved bus service during the Summer months when buses run from Monday to Friday from Weymouth to Swanage. Otherwise a local bus company runs a service on Wednesday and Saturday to Dorchester,and on Thursday to Weymouth There is a daily service along the main road between Weymouth to Bournemouth.The nearest railway station is at Wool. Several houses and farms in the village have a Bed and Breakfast business in the Summer months.
